headline.print_headline: Makers of Sodas Try a New Pitch: They’re Healthy
headline.main: Makers of Sodas Try a New Pitch: They’re Healthy

docs.lead_paragraph: In coming months, Coca-Cola and PepsiCo will introduce carbonated drinks fortified with vitamins and minerals.
docs.snippet: In coming months, Coca-Cola and PepsiCo will introduce carbonated drinks fortified with vitamins and minerals.

headline.main: Into the Mouths of Babes: Childhood Obesity

docs.abstract: Obesity surgery in children is on the rise... is that a good thing? And is childhood obesity child abuse?
docs.lead_paragraph: The metrics used to measure our national girth are legion, but here's another: New research suggests that the number of American children having obesity surgery has tripled in recent years -- and that as many as 1,000 such operations this year may be performed on people between 12 and 19.
docs.snippet: Obesity surgery in children is on the rise... is that a good thing? And is childhood obesity child abuse?

headline.print_headline: Pounds Add Up on Summer Break, Study Says
headline.main: On the Scales: Pounds Add Up on Summer Break, Study Says

docs.lead_paragraph: Summer. The perfect time for children to play outside, swim — and get fatter?
